page.title: 04The Railway
page.content: The two main forms of transport are the railway and the motorway. We will now tell you some news about the railway .Between 80 to 90 trains pass through the White Ball Tunnel every day.The majority are high speed passenger diesel trains but some are goods and Royal Mail trains.They pass through the tunnel at speeds of between 70 to 80 m.p.h.The railway line runs from Penzance <Cornwall> in the south west to Scotland in the north and also Paddington London in the S.E.It took about a hundred men to build the tunnel and it was about 150 years ago. The tunnel is nearly a mile long and it's from a part of Somerset to a part of Devon. You can walk on top of some gorse to see a train go through the tunnel. When it has gone in the tunnel you can't hear it.
